prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: I apologize, but there is no actual document or content provided after the "The document" heading. The message ends with "!!!!!!!" which does not contain any meaningful information to extract knowledge from. To extract important knowledge, I would need the actual document or text to analyze. If you have a specific document or information you'd like me to review, please provide it and I'll be happy to assist you.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: apology, document, content, heading, information, extract, knowledge, analyze
